mentions.title: 28 Flowy Dresses You'll Basically Live In All Spring
mentions.content: 28 Flowy Dresses You'll Live In All Spring BuzzFeed Shopping logo BuzzFeed Shopping logo Search Gift Guide Beauty + Personal Care Fashion Home Sports + Fitness Stores Tech Kids Pets Sex Toys View All We hope you love our recommendations! Some may have been sent as samples, but all were independently selected by our editors. Just FYI, BuzzFeed and its publishing partners may collect a share of sales and/or other compensation from the links on this page. Posted on Apr 14, 2025 Subscribe to Shopping Newsletter Caret Down 28 Flowy Dresses You'll Basically Live In All Spring Now that the sun's social battery has recharged, it's time to stock up on maxis and midis. by Daniel Boan BuzzFeed Staff Facebook Pinterest Link Unless otherwise specified, all sizes in this post are listed in women's. 1. A flowy maxi with whimsical tied straps — it'll be your go-to dress for the influx of bridal showers you're currently getting invitations to. The bodice is nice and stretchy, while the tiered skirt will basically float around you as if you're carrying your own personal fan. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "Such a cute and comfy dress! It has a fun flow to the bottom of it, and the ties for straps add an extra dose of fabulous." — Kelsey Krucker Get it from Amazon for $21.78+ (available in sizes XS–4XL and 14 styles). 2. A V-neck dress featuring an adjustable twist-tie waist that comes in several cute polka-dot and floral designs — which are inarguably the two most springy patterns of all. Bonus points if you tie the belt into an adorable bow. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "For me, clothes pay for themselves based on the number of compliments that are received when an item is worn. I already liked the dress the moment I put it on, but all day long women commented about what a lovely and pretty dress it is (ooh, I like the color, ooh it’s so pretty, ooh, that dress looks like the start of a whole new wardrobe). The compliments made the reasonable dress price feel like a bargain deal. I guess I’m a sucker for polka dots and the power of hearing something positive during the day." — Isadelle Mercedes Get it from Amazon for $35.99 (available in sizes S–XL and 19 colors). 3. A sleeveless number with a button-down design and tiered skirt if you're looking to put a unique semi-formal twist on the classic swing dress. Throw on some strappy sandals , grab a round rattan bag , and your official spring brunch 'fit is sorted. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "I’ve been buying lots of dresses on Amazon for an upcoming vacation, and this one hits the mark perfectly! ...This is sooo comfortable! AND it has pockets! The best part is that my husband was trying to be helpful and did laundry, and he washed and dried this dress and I found it smashed into the laundry basket three days later. Not only did it still fit, but it wasn’t even wrinkled! Perfectly packable! Brb, gotta go buy all the other colors!" — DiKat Get it from Amazon for $27.67 (available in sizes S–XL and 22 colors). 4. A short-sleeve button-up dress that's long and fluttery, yet lightweight and breathable, so you'll probably still be reaching for this in the fall. Reviewers say they've received tons of compliments when wearing it, and you may even feel like a "fairytale princess." 👑 www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "I bought this dress on a whim and was a little skeptical about it. I have never received so many compliments on a dress before. I wore it on a trip to the Biltmore Estate with my husband and in laws and we honestly couldn't get through the day without someone stopping me every few minutes to ask where I got my dress or to tell me how gorgeous it was. It flowed beautifully on that windy day. I'm obsessed with it, I even bought two more in different colors. I highly recommend!!!" — Maria Get it from Amazon for $19.99+ (available in sizes XS–L and six colors). 5. An embroidered tulle dress so elegant and floaty it might make people curtsy or bow every time you enter the room. The vibrant floral embroidery is truly the epitome of spring, and the tulle will keep the skirt lightweight and airy as you flutter around like the spring fairy you are. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Note: Reviewers suggest having someone help you tie the corset lacing at the back. Some also say they had to adjust the straps for a more secure fit, so be sure to allow yourself time to make some alterations if necessary! Promising review: "I don’t ever write reviews but had to because this dress is literally EVERYTHING!! It’s so pretty and the fabric is high quality. I just wish for more occasions to wear it!!" — Norah Barnes Get it from Amazon for $59.99+ (available in women's sizes 0–28 Plus and in 13 colors). 6. An open-back design with a halter neckline and a fabulous floor-length cut I guarantee you'll twirl around in every 15 seconds. No worries if you get dizzy and need a break — the fabric is super comfy and lightweight enough to lounge around in. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "I have been wanting this same dress from a store in the mall, but it was $118. I was leery about this, considering it was much cheaper in cost, but it is PERFECT! It fit absolutely perfectly. Great length, too. Keep in mind you can't wear a bra with it, and if you are larger-busted (I'm small, an A cup), then it may fit totally differently. It's thin and lightweight, but with skin-colored undies, I had no problem with lines or visibility. I'm considering buying it in another color." — Bullitt02797 Get it from Amazon for $32.99+ (available in sizes S–XL and 34 colors). 7. An off-the-shoulder smock dress so springy and adorable, you might be crowned this year's May Queen. But not in the creepy Midsommar way. Actually, a flower crown would pair quite nicely with this... go ahead and book that flight to Sweden!! Reviewers especially love the side slit that's not only super breathable but also gives you ample room to show off your latest sandal purchase. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review : "Bought this for our couples beach photo session in Oahu and it was PERFECT!!! I received endless compliments whenever I’ve worn this: to dinner, the farmers market, shopping…anywhere and everywhere! The sleeves stay in place and don’t ride up or fall down, very flowy. Buy two!!! You won’t regret it! :)" — Christi Get it from Amazon for $43.99 (available in sizes XS–4XL and 27 styles). 8. A short-sleeve pleated dress with the absolute best feature a dress can have — POCKETS! The wide variety of vibrant prints doesn't hurt, either. Reviewers note that while the fabric is breathable and spring friendly, it's still heavy enough to stay in place so a slip isn't necessary! www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "I absolutely love this dress. I bought it in another print after trying it out for a few weeks. It washes and dries perfectly . Good material and pockets!!! I get so many compliments on it, especially the polka-dot one I ordered after this one. They are so versatile, and I wear it all seasons. When it is warmer as is, and in the fall and winter, I layer with it." — Annie Get it from Amazon for $19.99+ (available in sizes S–3XL and 28 colors). 9. A gorgeously floaty dress featuring a true wrap design, meaning you can customize it to your perfect fit. It's practically tailor-made for walking around barefoot on the grass. Like any good spring dress, reviewers say this one is super lightweight and never clingy. Amazon Promising review: "This dress is absolutely gorgeous! I love that it is a wrap dress because you can customize the waist for how you would like it to fit. I was worried about it being too low cut (because I am large in the chest area), but it fits perfectly. I can wear a regular bra and I don't feel like I am showing too much cleavage." — Danielle Palermini Get it from Amazon for $45.99+ (available in sizes XS–2XL, two lengths, and five colors available in the calf-length style and 20 available in the ankle-length style). 10. An A-line dress with a wrap waist design that's perfect for any upcoming spring parties... even if that party is just you and your roommate sitting around drinking wine. Bonus: it's airy enough to stick around for all your summer BBQs as well! www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "You won't be disappointed by this dress. It is good quality, the fabric is not see-through at all, and I LOVE having pockets! It washes well, the colors are vibrant and I went back to order more. This is perfect for casual shopping with cute sandals or the office." — Domestic Bliss Get it from Amazon for $24.49 (available in sizes S–2XL and 30 colors). 11. A black organza dress that would go perfectly with some Doc Martens if you like to wear all-black for spring — which even Miranda Priestly would consider quite groundbreaking. Pair it with a plain black slip and TA-DA! You just found the perfect spring dress with zero floral prints or pastel colors in sight. www.amazon.com Promising review: "I use this with a simple silk undergarment of the same color...From being a beach coverup for a casual and refreshing dress for the hotter days. Size up if you have bigger arms or large breasts as it doesn’t have any stretch to it at all." — Joan Espinoza-Gonzalez Get it from Amazon for $25.99 (available in sizes XS–3XL and four styles). 12. A casual-chic cocktail dress featuring gorgeous lace detailing at the waist for an extra dainty touch. It'll definitely be one of those "excuse me, where did you buy that?" dresses. No judgment if you decide to gatekeep it. www.amazon.com Promising review: "I was nervous about ordering online without trying on first, but BOY did it pay off. The decorative band around the middle is not at my waist. It's slightly above my waist, but not so high as to be a princess waist (right below the bust)... The skirt is all the way to the knee but not below it, so it's conservative enough to wear to a cocktail party... but also fun and twirly enough to wear out dancing (which is what I got it for). Am now looking for more dresses by this company!!!" — GHBeckwith Get it from Amazon for $31.99+ (available in sizes 4–12 and 26 colors). 13. A maxi dress with a skirt so voluminous you'll be tempted to fling it from side to side every time you walk. The linen and cotton blend fabric keeps things airy and lightweight, while the long sleeves are perfect for these early days of spring when the sun needs to recharge its social battery every few days. Any Size / Etsy Promising review: "Gorgeous dress! So generous in material. Perfectly sewn! Thank you for excellent service!" — shirleysullivan Any Size is a small business that makes beautiful tailored garments to fit up to 6XL! They recommend dry-cleaning this dress, but just look at it — it's so worth it. Get it from Any Size on Etsy for $38.60+ (available in sizes S–6XL and three colors). 14. A mini shift dress that has a breathable v-cut neckline and back, so you'll immediately reach for it once the sun is finally out in full force (signaling an official ~shift~ away from leggings season!). Also, the shade on the left is called "olive martini," which would be the perfect accessory. Preferably on a trendy rooftop bar with a nice stranger who offers to take pics of you and your friends when they see you struggling to take a group selfie. Impressions Impressions is an Arkansas-based woman-owned boutique serving up stylish apparel that can fit your budget. Get it from Impressions for $52 (available in sizes S–3XL and in navy and olive — not all sizes available in both colors). 15. A bohemian print dress — it feels like your favorite nightgown but looks trendy enough for an impromptu photo shoot when you spot the flower wall at that new restaurant that's blowing up on TikTok. Oh, and the elastic waistline will keep you comfy all day long. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "This dress is super cute! Material is soft and lightweight; the fit is loose and flowy. Perfect throw-on dress for summer in Florida, but cute enough to wear to brunch or dinner." — Lauren Carlucci Get it from Amazon for $37.99 (available in sizes S–XL and 31 colors). 16. A short-sleeve dress so cute, you'll be tempted to wear it on a weekly basis. You'll feel dressed up enough for an important meeting, but you won't mind lounging around in it once you get back home. The material is a lovely mid-weight fabric, so prepare to pull this back out when the early days of fall come around. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "Material is light, but I love that I can wear a slip, tights, and a cardigan in the fall or winter to make this dress last year-round. Great buy!!!" — FOUR UR Review Get it from Amazon for $31.98 (available in 14–26 Plus and 39 colors). 17. A ridiculously cute dress with a stretchy high-waisted design that's so comfortable you might still reach for it on your work-from-home days. It also has a unique bow-tie neckline and ruffled sleeves to help it stand out from the rest of your go-to dresses. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "I needed a dress to easily pack in my suitcase that was no-iron or fancy treatment needed after the suitcase. This was for a dinner with my boyfriend's family and I was meeting them for the first time. It was such a hit. Of course, right out of the package you see it and think, 'hmmm is this too cheap looking?' but it seriously looks great on and I dressed it up with tights. I wore the other color to my boyfriend's work party. It’s a great no-fuss dress that packs and wears easy." — Amazon Customer Get it from Amazon for $33.89 (available in sizes S–XL and 24 colors). 18. Or! A similar knee-length flared sundress , but this one has a unique buttoned skirt design that comes in so many different color combinations. You could pretty much just buy one for every day of the week and have a much more stylish version of a spring work uniform. www.amazon.com Several reviewers say this runs true to size! Promising review: "This is dress is prefect for work, casual events, etc. I absolutely loved it and it’s really comfy. The material is soft and not too heavy but heavy enough. I reside in Arizona and it’s prefect for the summer! A lot of people confused it for a skirt, so I think of it as two outfits in one." — Robert G. Get it from Amazon for $31.90 (available in sizes S–XL and 10 colors). 19. A popular maxi dress with short sleeves but a super long length, making it perfect for those transitional days when it's way too warm for a jacket but not quite hot enough for shorts. And I truly meant it when I said this is popular — it's impressed over 10,000 Amazon reviewers so far! www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "This dress is lightweight enough to wear in warmer weather, and I'm looking forward to wearing it with tights and a long cardigan well into cooler months. A blank canvas to accessorize as you like with long necklaces, boho bracelets, a wide-brimmed hat. Looks great with sandals, probably cute with snow boots. All around a versatile, staple piece. I imagine it'd be great for capsule collections. I live with a dog who sheds fur furiously (ha), and I was easily able to shake his fur out of the dress and still go out in public. The fabric doesn't hold on to fur and, if you get a dark color, is fairly forgiving to messes and stains throughout the day, for those of us who are inclined to be a little clumsy. " — Amber Get it from Amazon for $29.59+ (available in sizes S–3XL and 42 colors). 20. A button-up midi sundress that'll keep the casual-chic vibes coming all season long — and it might even take you through the fall when paired with a denim jacket . www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "Don't you hate when you buy the exact same thing in different colors and the sizes are completely different? Well, no need to worry about that with this dress. I have five different ones, all the same size (m) and all fit exactly the same. They are perfect ... The dress is amazing, it has real functional buttons all the way down. It's made of a nice soft material that is light enough to be cool and comfortable even in the south Florida heat but it's not even the slightest bit see through even in the lighter colors. " — KL Get it from Amazon for $32.90 (available in sizes S–XL and 18 colors). 21. A relaxed dress with a flowy empire waist and pleated skirt that adds a bit of retro-chic flair to your warm-weather wardrobe. I'm also delighted to inform you that it indeed has hidden pockets, so you'll have a place to hold your Black Honey lipstick for quick touch-ups. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "I love this. I started out with one and found myself wearing it so often that I have now purchased three more patterns... They will look nice with a sweater once it cools down, but are great as summer dresses." — RPaxman Get it from Amazon for $27.93+ (available in sizes S–XL and 29 colors). 22. mentions.title: Andean Women Farmers in Peru Face Climate Crisis with Green Practices
mentions.content: Andean Women Farmers in Peru Face Climate Crisis with Green Practices | Inter Press Service Languages ESPAÑOL FRANÇAIS DEUTSCH ITALIANO JAPANESE NEDERLANDS PORTUGUÊS SUOMI SVENSKA SWAHILI TÜRKÇE Tuesday, April 15, 2025 INTER PRESS SERVICE News Agency News and Views from the Global South Africa Asia-Pacific Europe Latin America & the Caribbean Middle East & North Africa North America Global Home Development & Aid Aid Education Energy Health Food & Agriculture Humanitarian Emergencies Poverty & SDGs Population Economy & Trade Financial Crisis Green Economy Labour Natural Resources Trade & Investment Cooperatives Environment Advancing Deserts Biodiversity Climate Change Green Economy Water & Sanitation Human Rights Armed Conflicts Crime & Justice Democracy Indigenous Rights LGBTQ Migration & Refugees Press Freedom Religion Global Governance Civilisations Find Alliances Eye on the IFIs Global Geopolitics Globalisation Peace South-South United Nations South-South G77 Regional Alliances Southern Aid & Trade Civil Society Active Citizens World Social Forum Conferences Gender Gender Violence Women & Economy Women & Climate Change Women’s Health Gender Identity Women in Politics Climate Action , Climate Change Justice , Development & Aid , Economy & Trade , Editors' Choice , Featured , Food and Agriculture , Green Economy , Headlines , Latin America & the Caribbean , Natural Resources , Population , Sustainable Development Goals , TerraViva United Nations , Women & Climate Change , Women & Economy Climate Change Justice Andean Women Farmers in Peru Face Climate Crisis with Green Practices By Mariela Jara Reprint | | Print | | En español With rain, hail, and frost coming at the wrong time and damaging crops, a group of Andean women farmers living 3,000 meters above sea level have turned to agroecological practices to secure their food production. Quechua farmer Anacleta Mamani inside her greenhouse in Poques, in Peru’s Cusco region, where she practices agroecological farming as an alternative to face the effects of climate change. Credit: Mariela Jara / IPS LAMAY, Peru, Apr 14 2025 (IPS) - “Up here in the highlands, there’s a lot of frost, and everything seems bleak. But I’m so happy since I got my greenhouse and started growing vegetables in a healthy way. I feel like we’re overcoming the challenges of the weather,” Anacleta Mamani, a Quechua farmer from the community of Poques (about an hour’s drive from Cusco, the former imperial capital of Peru), told IPS. Poques is one of 13 farming communities in the municipality of Lamay, located nearly 3,000 meters above sea level in the province of Calca, in the southeastern department of Cusco. Like much of rural Peru’s Andean highlands, the area faces persistent poverty and neglect from the national government—a disadvantage worsened by the climate crisis. This South American country of 34 million people is highly vulnerable to climate change, even though its greenhouse gas emissions account for less than 1 percent of the global total, according to a 2021 measurement by Peru’s Environment Ministry . The ministry, citing figures from the United Nations Development Programme (UNDP), reports that around 5.5 million Peruvians are exposed to floods and another 2.6 million to droughts. Among the most affected are family farmers, as they depend on natural resources—particularly women, due to gender inequalities that limit their ability to respond. “Before, we only grew potatoes, corn, and quinoa for daily sustenance. Now we also have a variety of vegetables we didn’t even know how to eat before. With the techniques we’ve learned, we’re better equipped to face the climate crisis, which is hitting us hard,” said Mamani, one of 120 families in her community, located in Cusco’s Sacred Valley, known for its landscapes and traditions. She is one of 80 women farmers taking part in a training project led by the non-governmental Flora Tristán Peruvian Women’s Center , aimed at developing their farming skills to confront climate change while increasing their participation and decision-making in community organizations. “We’ve learned that the first step is working the land—digging up to 60 centimeters deep and loosening the soil so it can breathe. Otherwise, the plants die even if you water them. That’s the first good agroecological practice we’re applying in the greenhouses,” Mamani explained proudly. In four municipalities in Cusco, in the Andean highlands of southeastern Peru, greenhouses aim to enhance the agricultural skills of women engaged in family farming, helping them better cope with the climate crisis. Credit: Mariela Jara / IPS Agroecology in Daily Life A Quechua speaker born in Poques 59 years ago, Mamani has dedicated her life to farming and family work, never having the chance to attend school. Now, she feels vindicated as she enriches her ancestral knowledge as a student of the Agroecological School run by the Flora Tristán Center with support from the Basque Development Cooperation Agency and Mugen Gainetik . “For a while now, rains, hail, and frost come at the wrong time and cause a lot of damage. Last year, the wind was so strong it flattened the cornfields, and we couldn’t harvest anything—just losses,” she recalled, gesturing with her hands as engineer Janet Nina translated her words into Spanish for IPS. Peru’s National Meteorology and Hydrology Service (Senamhi) reported that 2024 was the hottest year in the last six decades. The consequences included droughts and heavy rainfall, impacting areas like family farming, leading to crop losses and food insecurity. The 80 trained women farmers come from four districts or municipalities: San Salvador, Coya, Calca, and Lamay. Each has a 100-square-meter greenhouse equipped with a drip irrigation system, in which they’ve also been trained for sustainable use. “We water just enough—no more wasting water. I water my cauliflower, broccoli, cabbage, lettuce, carrots, and tomatoes early in the morning before the sun gets too strong, because I have to walk a long way from my house to the greenhouse,” Mamani said. The family of Quechua farmer Anacleta Mamani in Poques, in the Peruvian Andes. Her children Avelina and Ricardo Cruz (second from left and first from right, respectively), along with other family members, have embraced Mamani’s teachings on agroecology to protect the environment and biodiversity threatened by climate change while also improving their daily diet. Credit: Mariela Jara / IPS She also grows squash ( Cucurbita pepo ), beets, chard ( Beta vulgaris ), beans ( Phaseolus vulgaris ), and other vegetables, now a staple in her household diet. The surplus, which is growing, is currently bartered with other families in the community, but starting in May, she will also sell them in nearby markets, providing her with her own income. Through training, she also learned to make natural fertilizers. “I save fruit peels, potato skins, eggshells, and all kitchen scraps, along with ashes from the stove, animal bones, and manure from chickens, sheep, and guinea pigs. We mix it all to make fertilizer that nourishes the soil, producing healthy, strong, and tasty plants,” she shared. She passes this knowledge on to her family—her husband, daughter, son, and their respective families. This dynamic is replicated by other women in the Agroecological School, spreading this climate-resilient farming method. “In my mom’s greenhouse, there’s a special climate. We can grow many vegetables and eat better. The crops are protected from weather extremes, and we can keep practicing agroecology, caring for our environment, our Pachamama (Mother Earth), and our water for future generations,” said Avelina Cruz, 36, who learns from her mother alongside her husband and teenage daughter. Her husband works in Cusco city and returns on weekends to help apply what they’ve learned. “We do it carefully because, as my mom says, the plants ‘speak.’ Protecting nature is our small way of preventing climate change from destroying us,” Cruz said. Diverse vegetable production with an agroecological approach is being developed on the high Andean slopes of communities in southeastern Peru. Credit: Mariela Jara / IPS Leading the Charge Sociologist Elena Villanueva, the project leader, emphasized the role of Andean rural women in the climate crisis. “They aren’t responsible for this situation threatening food and water security and human health, yet they don’t hesitate to take action,” she told IPS in Cusco. She highlighted agroecology as a sustainable production model that helps restore ecosystems. “It’s an alternative to industrial, extractive, monoculture-based farming, which worsens global warming and harms the well-being of rural women and families,” she said. She warned that “we’re at a critical moment where industrialized nations most responsible for climate change are backtracking on emission reduction commitments, ignoring the consequences for vulnerable populations.” She urged national policies to prioritize family farming, which supplies nearly 70% of Peru’s food. “Our authorities must turn their attention to the countryside, promote agroecology, and close gender gaps,” she demanded. In rural areas, women have less access to land, water, seeds, and other resources while bearing heavy workloads that hinder their leadership and political participation. The mayor of Lamay, Glicerio Delgado, criticized the Peruvian government for ignoring rural development demands, including proposals to expand greenhouses and implement water catchment projects as sustainable practices to address climate challenges. Credit: Mariela Jara / IPS Lack of Support Peru recognizes 55 Indigenous peoples —51 from the Amazon and four from the Andes, including the Quechua, the largest group, with nearly five million members nationwide, including rural-to-urban migrants. About 14 percent of Peruvians speak Quechua as their first language. Peru’s 2017 national census was the first to include ethnic self-identification. Andean rural women are mostly Quechua and have inherited ancestral farming knowledge. But migration and shifting community dynamics have left some struggling to adapt to climate challenges. Traditionally, reading nature’s signs guided farming, but this is no longer enough with current erratic weather and rain patterns. Women now face turmoil, which causes constant worry as family farming sustains their households. Lamay’s mayor, Glicerio Delgado, expressed commitment to rural development and climate resilience but lamented the lack of national support. “There’s much to do—expanding greenhouses, building water catchment systems for family farming led by women. But so far the Ministry of Economy and Finance hasn’t responded to our funding requests,” he said. Meanwhile, in the four Cusco municipalities, Anacleta Mamani and her 79 peers will keep working to sustain their homes with agroecological practices, strengthening their resilience against climate extremes. This feature is published with the support of Open Society Foundations. Her children Avelina and Ricardo Cruz (second from left and first from right, respectively), along with other family members, have embraced Mamani’s teachings on agroecology to protect the environment and biodiversity threatened by climate change while also improving their daily diet. Credit: Mariela Jara / IPS In four municipalities in Cusco, in the Andean highlands of southeastern Peru, greenhouses aim to enhance the agricultural skills of women engaged in family farming, helping them better cope with the climate crisis. mentions.title: Meta faces landmark US antitrust trial
mentions.content: Meta faces landmark US antitrust trial × Advertise with us Tuesday, April 15, 2025 PunchNG Menu: Video Spice Special Features Education Sex & Relationship Interview Columns Opinion Advertise with us Meta faces landmark US antitrust trial 14th April 2025 Meta Agency Report Kindly share this story: Getting your Trinity Audio player ready... Social media juggernaut Meta is on trial on Monday. It faces serious US government allegations that it abused its market power to acquire Instagram and WhatsApp before they could become competitors. By moving forward, the trial in a Washington federal court dashes the hopes of Meta boss Mark Zuckerberg that the return of Donald Trump to the White House would see the government let up on the enforcement of antitrust law against Big Tech. The Meta case is being made by the Federal Trade Commission, the powerful US consumer protection agency, and could see the owner of Facebook forced to divest Instagram and WhatsApp, which have grown into global powerhouses since their buyout. The trial will be run and decided by Judge James Boasberg, who is also presiding over a high-profile case involving White House orders to deport Venezuelans using wartime law. The case against Meta was originally filed in December 2020, during the first Trump administration, and all eyes were on whether he would ask the FTC to stand down. Zuckerberg, the world’s third-richest person, has made repeated visits to the White House as he tries to persuade the US leader to choose settlement instead of fighting the trial, a decision that would be extraordinary at this late stage. FTC Chair Andrew Ferguson played down such a possibility, telling The Verge, “I’d be very surprised if anything like that ever happened.” As part of his lobbying efforts, Zuckerberg contributed to Trump’s inauguration fund and overhauled content moderation policies. He also purchased a $23 million mansion in Washington in what was seen as a bid to spend more time close to the center of political power. “It would be borderline scandalous if Zuckerberg went to the White House and wound up with a settlement,” Jonathan Kanter, an antitrust enforcer under the Biden administration, told CNBC. The Meta lawsuit represents just one of five major tech antitrust actions recently initiated by the US government. Google is facing two cases and was found guilty of search-market dominance abuse last August, while Apple and Amazon are also heading to court. Zuckerberg, his former lieutenant Sheryl Sandberg, and a long line of executives from rival companies will be taking the stand over a trial expected to last at least eight weeks. Central to the case is Facebook’s 2012 billion-dollar purchase of Instagram — then a small but promising photo-sharing app that now boasts two billion active users. EXPLAINER: Understanding Trump’s tariff policy — and what it means for Nigeria Ecuador reelects incumbent Daniel Noboa as president How to boost economic growth – Agbakoba An email from Zuckerberg cited by the FTC showed him depicting Instagram’s emergence as “really scary,” adding that is “why we might want to consider paying a lot of money for this.” The FTC argues Meta’s $19 billion WhatsApp acquisition in 2014 followed the same pattern, with Zuckerberg fearing the messaging app could either transform into a social network or be purchased by a competitor. Meta’s defense attorneys will argue that its substantial investments transformed these acquisitions into the blockbusters they are today. They will also highlight that Meta’s apps are free for users and face fierce competition. The FTC argues that Meta’s monopoly power is demonstrated by a severely downgraded user experience — with too many ads and product changes that users have no choice but to tolerate. – Defining the market – A key courtroom battleground will be how FTC defines Meta’s market. The US government argues that Facebook and Instagram are dominant players in apps that provide a way to connect with family and friends, a category that does not include TikTok and YouTube. But Meta disagrees. “The evidence at trial will show what every 17-year-old in the world knows: Instagram, Facebook and WhatsApp compete with Chinese-owned TikTok, YouTube, X, iMessage and many others,” a spokesperson said. “The bigger that Meta can make the relevant market… the more likely it is to defeat the FTC’s case,” said lawyer Brendan Benedict on Substack. mentions.title: How to SIM Unlock the Google Pixel 9 for FREE: Step-by-Step Guide
mentions.content: How to SIM Unlock the Google Pixel 9 for FREE: Step-by-Step Guide - Phandroid 0 If you’ve just picked up the new Google Pixel 9 — congrats! It’s a fantastic phone that delivers premium features at a more accessible price point. However, if your Pixel 9 is locked to a specific carrier, it can limit your options, especially when traveling internationally. Unlocking your SIM gives you the freedom to pop in a local SIM card and dodge those expensive roaming charges. In this guide, we’ll walk you through two trusted ways to unlock your Pixel 9: For free, through your carrier Via a fast and affordable paid service 💡 Pro tip: Still shopping for the Pixel 9? Check out our Pixel Price Tracker for the latest offers. And once your phone is unlocked, make sure to protect it with one of the best rugged Pixel 9 cases . Method 1: Unlocking Your Pixel 9 for Free (Through Your Carrier) Most carriers are willing to unlock your Pixel 9 at no cost — but you’ll need to meet their basic eligibility requirements: ✅ Your contract is fully paid off or expired ✅ Your account has no outstanding balance ✅ Your Pixel 9 has been active for at least 60–90 days If you tick all the boxes, just follow these steps: Get your IMEI number: Open the Phone app and dial *#06#. Write down your IMEI number for reference. Contact your carrier’s customer support: Ask them to unlock your Pixel 9’s SIM. Provide your IMEI number when requested. Wait for confirmation: If you qualify, they’ll send the unlock code to your email within 2–5 business days. Unlock your device: Insert a SIM card from a different carrier. Enter the unlock code when prompted — and you’re good to go! 🛒 Bonus: Haven’t bought your Pixel 9 yet? Check the latest deals on Amazon before prices change! Important: Carrier policies can differ, so it’s always best to double-check with your provider before starting the process. Method 2: Unlocking Your Pixel 9 via Android SIM Unlock If you don’t qualify for a free unlock, or just want a faster, hassle-free solution, consider using a trusted service like Android SIM Unlock . It’s quick, simple, and gets the job done fast. Here’s how: Retrieve your IMEI number: Open the Phone app, dial *#06#, and jot down your IMEI number. Go to Android SIM Unlock’s Pixel 9 page: Head over to Android SIM Unlock for Pixel 9 . Enter your details: Input your Pixel 9’s IMEI number and complete the payment process. Receive your unlock code: The code will be sent via email or SMS, usually within minutes. Unlock your Pixel 9: Swap in a SIM card from a new carrier. Enter the unlock code when prompted, and you’re all set! 🛡️ Protect your phone: Once unlocked, keep your Pixel 9 safe with one of the best rugged cases of 2025 . Quick Reminder: Unlocking Doesn’t Cancel Your Carrier Plan Keep in mind, unlocking your Pixel 9 doesn’t mean you’re off the hook for any unpaid bills or contract obligations. You’ll still need to settle any existing payments with your carrier. If you’re getting ready for travel or switching networks, unlocking your Pixel 9 is a smart way to give yourself more freedom and flexibility. 💡 Stay updated: For fresh Pixel deals, be sure to bookmark our Pixel Price Tracker . Shipping is free with Walmart+ ( Free 30-Day Trial Here ) or orders $35 or more. Available: PlayStation 5 Xbox Series X Thanks to Deal Hunter Eragorn for finding this deal. About this Game : Explore HELL-A – Dead Island 2 takes players across the most iconic locations of the City of Angels, now stained with horror, in an exciting pulp journey from the verdant suburbia of Beverly Hills to the quirky promenade of Venice Beach. New Ways to Slay - Join the Bobcats, in a new co-op horde mode! And continue your adventure in New Game+, featuring new zombies, abilities, weapons and more. Brutal Melee Sandbox – Combat delivers the most intense, visceral and gory first person experience possible, with plenty of weapons and tactical (and brutal) options to chew your way through the zombie horde. Whether you're slicing, smashing, burning or ripping, we want you to truly feel it. Be the Ultimate Zombie Slayer – There are six characters to choose from, each with their own unique personality and dialogues. You can fully customize the abilities of each Slayer, with our brand-new skill system allowing you to re-spec instantly and try out the craziest builds. The Ultimate Edition includes: Haus and SoLA expansions, Memories of Banoi Pack Golden Weapons Pack, Pulp Weapons Pack, Red's Demise Katana, 6 Premium Character Packs, Kingdom Come: Deliverance II Pack Editor's Notes Written by Corwin | Staff About this Deal: Our research indicates that this product is priced $10 lower ( 25% savings ) than the next best available price from a reputable merchant with prices starting from $39.99 at the time of this post. mentions.title: クラウドファンディングで大反響の注目の新製品がいよいよ4月25日(金)より全国発売開始
mentions.content: クラウドファンディングで大反響の注目の新製品がいよいよ4月25日(金)より全国発売開始 | デロンギ・ジャパン株式会社のプレスリリース PR TIMESのご利用について 資料をダウンロード クラウドファンディングで大反響の注目の新製品がいよいよ4月25日(金)より全国発売開始 挽くたびに、特別。コーヒーの新習慣。多彩なカフェメニューとコーヒー豆の組み合わせが楽しめる「デロンギ リヴェリア 全自動コーヒーマシン」 デロンギ・ジャパン株式会社 2025年4月14日 13時00分 デロンギ・ジャパン株式会社(本社：東京都港区 代表取締役社長：甲斐ラース)は、 2024年12月16日から2025年3月7日までクラウドファンディングサイト“GREEN FUNDING/グリーンファンディング”にて支援募集をし、大好評(支援者数892人)を得た次世代モデル『デロンギ リヴェリア(Rivelia)全自動コーヒーマシン(EXAM44035/EXAM44055)』を、4月25日(金)より全国発売いたします。 デロンギ リヴェリア 全自動コーヒーマシンは、豊富なコーヒー・ミルクメニューを楽しめるだけでなく、デロンギ初の「ビーン スイッチ システム」を採用。取り換え式の2つの豆ホッパーにより、最大16種類*のメニューとお好みのコーヒー豆を手軽に組み合わせて、さらにコーヒーの楽しみ方が広がります。また、従来のコーヒーマシンの概念を覆す洗練されたデザインを採用し、ぺブルグレー、サンドベージュ、オニキスブラックの3色を展開。どんなキッチンにも調和し、インテリアとしても美しく空間を演出します。*コーヒーモデルは8種類のメニューを搭載 デロンギ リヴェリアは、コーヒーの濃さや量などを自分好みに調整できるカスタマイズ機能を搭載し、抽出条件を登録すると時間帯に応じて自動で切り替わる「コーヒールーティン」機能も備えています。使い方も簡単で、上部のカラー液晶パネルでメニューを選択するだけ。直感的な操作で、こだわりの一杯をお楽しみいただけます。 本製品はクラウドファンディング期間中、全国各地で展示・試飲会を実施し、多くのお客様に実際にお試しいただきました。お客様からは、「実際に使ってみたら、期待以上に美味しく、操作も簡単だった」「2つの豆ホッパーがあり、デカフェの豆と入れ替えられるのも嬉しい」「操作が簡単で、スマホのように直感的に使える」といった声が多く寄せられました。また、「自動で内部洗浄してくれるのでお手入れがとてもラクそう」「カスタマイズ機能が豊富で、自分好みの一杯を簡単に作れる」と、機能面でも高い評価をいただきました。さらに、「ミルクメニューが8種類もあり、お店に行かなくても本格的なラテが楽しめる」「カフェで飲むようなふわふわのカプチーノがボタン一つで作れるのは感動的」と、充実したミルクメニューも好評。デザインについても、「スリムなサイズ感がキッチンになじみやすく、圧迫感がない」「他にはないカラー展開で、インテリアとしても映える」と、大変多くのお客様からご好評のお声をいただくことができました。 多彩なメニュー、自分好みに楽しめる豊富なスタマイズ機能、直感的な操作性を兼ね備えたデロンギ リヴェリアで、挽くたびに、特別な一杯を楽しめるコーヒーの新習慣をご堪能ください。 デロンギ リヴェリア 全自動コーヒーマシンの特長 ■最大16種類のメニューで自由自在な楽しみ方を実現 最大16種類のメニューを液晶画面からタッチするだけで挽きたて･淹れたてのカフェメニューを簡単にお楽しみいただけます。 ●ミルクメニュー 8種類：カプチーノ、カフェラテ、フラットホワイト、コルタード、エスプレッソマキアート、ラテマキアート、カプチーノMIX、ミルク ●コーヒーメニュー 8種類：エスプレッソ、アメリカーノ、カフェ・ジャポーネ、スペシャルティ、エスプレッソラージ、エスプレッソ(コールド)、アイスコーヒー、アメリカーノ(コールド) ミルクモデルのEXAM44055G/EXAM44055BGはミルクメニュー8種類とコーヒーメニュー8種類、合わせて16種類のメニューを搭載し、コーヒーモデルのEXAM44035Bはコーヒーメニュー8種類を搭載しています。 ■豆ホッパーで手軽にコーヒー豆を入れ替え コーヒー豆の入れ替えを可能にした「ビーン スイッチ システム」を採用。取り替え可能な豆ホッパーで、メニューに合わせてコーヒー豆の組み合わせを自分好みに多彩にお楽しみいただけます。 ■カプチーノやカフェラテなどミルクメニューも全自動(EXAM44055のみ) デロンギ独自の自動ミルク泡立て技術「ラテクレマ™ホット」は、ミルクが最も甘くなる60～65℃の温度で抽出し、ミルクと泡の黄金比(2:3)を実現し、カフェのように美味しく仕上げます。コーヒーの抽出からフォームミルクの注入まで全て自動で、メニューに合わせて3段階のミルクの泡に調整可能。きめ細かく舌触り滑らかな泡の本格的なミルクメニューがワンタッチで楽しめます。牛乳のほか豆乳など植物性ミルクにも対応しています。 ※コーヒーモデルEXAM44035Bは、スチームフロッサーが付属しています。 ■革新的で洗練されたデザインとスタイリッシュなカラー 従来のコーヒーマシンの概念を覆す、革新的で洗練されたデザインとインテリアとしてどんなスタイルのキッチンにも映えるスタイリッシュなカラーを採用。EXAM44035Bは定番で人気のブラックカラー(オニキスブラック)、EXAM44055G/EXAM44055BGは本体に新色(ペブルグレー、サンドベージュ)を採用し、キッチンをスタイリッシュで優雅に彩ります。 ■カスタマイズ・パーソナライズ機能であなた好みの極上の一杯を メニューごとにコーヒーの豆量、コーヒーやミルクの抽出量を設定できるカスタマイズ機能とカスタマイズしたメニューを最大四つのプロフィールに登録できるパーソナライズ機能を搭載。お気に入りのメニューと味わいをいつでも簡単に抽出できます。また、朝・昼・夕方の時間帯ごとに設定した抽出量や豆量が自動的に切り替える「コーヒールーティン」機能により、ライフスタイルに合わせた味わいを手軽にお楽しみいただけます。 ■専用アクセサリでコールドミルクメニューまで楽しめる(EXAM44055のみ) 専用アクセサリ「ラテクレマクールアップグレードセット」に含まれる「ラテクレマ™クール」のミルクコンテナをマシンにセットするだけで、6種類のコールドミルクメニューがお楽しみいただけます。「ラテクレマ™クール」は、アロマを十分に引き出されたコーヒーが、氷と混ざり合ったときに最適な状態となる温度帯のスチーム・フォームミルクを作り出します。氷と混ぜた際に水っぽくならずに、ミルクの甘みをしっかりと感じる、おいしいコールドミルクメニューが楽しめます。 ●コールドのミルクメニュー 6種類 カプチーノ(コールド)、カプチーノMIX(コールド)、ラテマキアート(コールド)、カフェラテ(コールド)、フラットホワイト(コールド)、コールドミルク 【 製品情報 】 製品名： デロンギ リヴェリア 全自動コーヒーマシン 型式番号：EXAM44055G EXAM44055BG EXAM44035B 本体色：ペブルグレー(EXAM44055G) サンドベージュ(EXAM44055BG) オニキスブラック(EXAM44035B) 希望小売価格 ：オープン ペブルグレー：商品サイトはこちら サンドベージュ：商品サイトはこちら オニキスブラック：商品サイトはこちら デロンギ リヴェリア 全自動コーヒーマシンは、ビックカメラ、ヨドバシカメラ、デロンギ直営店（表参道店）とデロンギ公式オンラインショップ、デロンギ公式楽天市場店、デロンギ公式Yahoo! ショッピング店とAmazonでお求めいただけます。 ミルクモデル(EXAM44055G/ EXAM44055BG)専用アクセサリ「ラテクレマクールアップグレードセット」 同梱物：ラテクレマ™クールミルクコンテナ ダブルウォールグラス 400ml×2 ダブルウォールグラス 480ml×2 ラテクレマアップグレードセット 《新CM概要》 ・タイトル：「デロンギ全自動コーヒーマシン Perfetto コーヒーの新習慣篇」（30秒） ・TVCM放映開始日：2025年4月14日（月） ・TVCM放映エリア：沖縄を除く日本全国 ・主演：ブラッド・ピット（俳優） ・日本語ナレーション出演：津田健次郎（声優・俳優） ・制作チーム：ベネット・ミラー（監督）、ジャスティン・ ハーウィッツ（音楽） ▼新TVCM動画 デロンギ全自動コーヒーマシンTVCM「デロンギ全自動コーヒーマシン Perfetto コーヒーの新習慣篇」 ※デロンギ・ジャパン公式YouTubeにて近日公開予定 デロンギのメンバーシッププログラム「De’Longhi Family」 デロンギ製品をご購入いただいたお客様に、安心して製品を長くご愛用いただくため、ご購入後のメーカー無償保証期間の延長、万が一の際の迅速な修理対応といったアフターケアを大幅に拡大し提供いたします。 また、メンバー限定の先行情報として、新商品やセールなどの最新情報もいち早くお届けいたします。 詳細はこちら ■GREEN FUNDINGとは 未来を企画する「デジタル上の見本市」として、革新的な製品が集まるプラットフォームを運用。CCCグループと連携し、ガジェット・雑貨・映画・出版・音楽・地域活性化など様々なジャンルのプロジェクトを掲載。現在5,400を超えるプロジェクト、総計155億円以上の資金調達をサポートしています。 ■デロンギ ― 進化し続けるブランド ― デロンギ(De’Longhi)は、20世紀前半より、イタリア北部の街トレヴィーゾでクラフトマンワークショップ（職人の作業場）としてスタートしたイタリアの家電ブランドです。1974年に、最初の電気機器であるオイルヒーターを製造し、工房から工場へと飛躍的に発展を遂げました。1990年代には、暖房器具の製造で使われる技術を用いて、コーヒーマシンの開発・製造にも参入。コーヒー市場に積極的に新しい製品を投入し続け、現在、全自動コーヒーマシンをはじめとするコーヒーマシン市場において世界的トップシェアを誇ります。 ■デロンギ・ジャパンについて デロンギ・グループの日本法人の「デロンギ・ジャパン株式会社」は1995年に設立。主な事業は、日本市場向け家庭用・業務用電気製品の輸入販売となり、以下分野の商品・付帯サービスを取り扱っています。 1. オイルヒーター、マルチダイナミックヒーター、パネルヒーター、ファンヒーター等の暖房機器および空気清浄機付きファン。 2. 全自動コーヒーマシン、エスプレッソ・カプチーノメーカー、ドリップコーヒーメーカー等のコーヒー機器。 3. ハンドブレンダー、フードプロセッサー、コンベクションオーブン、電気ケトル等の小型調理家電製品。 主力商品であるオイルヒーターは、2004年以来20年間、日本市場において販売台数・売上No.1※１の地位にあり、多くのお客様から支持され続けています。コーヒー機器分野でも、日本だけでなく世界各国でコーヒーメーカー売上No.１※2を獲得しており、優れた機能だけでなく、洗練された美しいデザイン性を備えたデロンギ製品は、世界の国と地域で愛されています。 ※1 独立調査機関調べ 2004年1月～2023年12月 日本国内数量・金額シェア ※2 独立調査機関調べ 2023年1月～12月 このプレスリリースには、 メディア関係者向けの情報があります メディアユーザーログイン 既に登録済みの方はこちら メディアユーザー新規登録 無料 メディアユーザー登録を行うと、企業担当者の連絡先や、 イベント・記者会見の情報など様々な特記情報を閲覧できます。 ※内容はプレスリリースにより異なります。 すべての画像 種類 商品サービス ビジネスカテゴリ 調理・生活家電 キーワード デロンギ リヴェリア 全自動コーヒーマシン クラウドファンディング 全国発売開始 ダウンロード プレスリリース添付資料 . pdf プレスリリース素材 このプレスリリース内で使われている画像ファイルがダウンロードできます 会社概要 デロンギ・ジャパン株式会社 33 フォロワー mentions.title: デロンギと始める “コーヒーの新習慣”デロンギ リヴェリア 全自動コーヒーマシン発売記念　コーヒー豆との組み合わせで多彩なカフェメニューをご体感いただける新製品体験・試飲イベントを開催
mentions.content: デロンギと始める “コーヒーの新習慣”デロンギ リヴェリア 全自動コーヒーマシン発売記念 コーヒー豆との組み合わせで多彩なカフェメニューをご体感いただける新製品体験・試飲イベントを開催 | デロンギ・ジャパン株式会社のプレスリリース PR TIMESのご利用について 資料をダウンロード デロンギと始める “コーヒーの新習慣”デロンギ リヴェリア 全自動コーヒーマシン発売記念 コーヒー豆との組み合わせで多彩なカフェメニューをご体感いただける新製品体験・試飲イベントを開催 イベント特典もご用意 六本木ヒルズカフェ/スペースで4月26日（土）・27日（日）の2日間 デロンギ・ジャパン株式会社 2025年4月14日 13時00分 デロンギ・ジャパン株式会社（本社：東京都港区 代表取締役社長：甲斐ラース）は、全自動コーヒーマシンの次世代モデルとして、多彩なコーヒー・ミルクメニューとコーヒー豆の組み合わせで、さらに自分好みのコーヒー体験を楽しめる『デロンギ リヴェリア 全自動コーヒーマシン（EXAM44035B/EXAM44055G/EXAM44055BG）』(以下リヴェリア)を4月25日（金）に発売します。発売を記念して、新製品のお披露目とともに、実際に製品を使って淹れたての一杯を味わうことができる「挽くたびに、特別。コーヒーの新習慣を愉しむ二日間。」（参加無料・アンケート回答者対象、購入者対象の数量限定特典付き） を、4月26日（土）・ 27日（日）に六本木ヒルズカフェ/スペースで開催いたします。 デロンギの全自動コーヒーマシンは、豆から挽きたて淹れたて、極上の一杯をお届けすることにこだわっています。リヴェリアは、豊富なコーヒー・ミルクメニューを楽しめるだけでなく、デロンギ初の「ビーン スイッチ システム」を採用。取り換え式の2つの豆ホッパーにより、最大16種類*メニューとお好みのコーヒー豆を手軽に組み合わせて、さらにコーヒーの楽しみ方が広がります。また、従来のコーヒーマシンの概念を覆す、革新的で洗練されたデザインを採用し、ぺブルグレー、サンドベージュ、オニキスブラックの3色を展開。どんなキッチンにも調和し、インテリアとしても美しい空間を演出します。*コーヒーモデルは8種類のメニューを搭載 本イベントはどなたでもご参加いただけ、コーヒーの奥深い世界を体験できる、デロンギ・ジャパン専属バリスタの石井護氏がおすすめするリヴェリアのメニューとムセッティ社のコーヒー豆のペアリングメニューをご紹介。タッチ＆トライ（操作体験）コーナーでは、実際にマシンを操作してその場で淹れたての一杯を無料で試飲することができます。また、リヴェリアをはじめ、デロンギ全自動コーヒーマシンのラインアップを会場内に展示。気になる製品を見て、比べて、じっくりお選びいただけます。さらに、製品は会場にて購入可能となっており、会場でご購入いただいたお客様には、イベント限定のお得なご購入特典をプレゼントします（特典の数量に限りがございます）。 コーヒー豆との組み合わせで多彩なカフェメニューを味わえる、リヴェリアだからこそ可能なコーヒーの新習慣を体感できる特別な2日間にどうぞご来場ください。 「デロンギ リヴェリア 全自動コーヒーマシン発売記念イベント 挽くたびに、特別。コーヒーの新習慣を愉しむ二日間。」コンテンツご紹介 ■デロンギ・ジャパン専属バリスタおすすめ！リヴェリアでお愉しみいただける15種類のカフェメニューとコーヒー豆とのペアリングメニューのご紹介とタッチアンドトライ。 デロンギ・ジャパン専属バリスタの石井護氏がおすすめするリヴェリアでお愉しみいただけるカフェメニューとムセッティ社*の5種類のコーヒー豆とのペアリングメニューをご紹介する展示を行います。展示するムセッティ社の5種類のコーヒー豆の香りを実際に香って楽しんでいただきながら、ご自身のお好みやコーヒーの奥深い世界を探求することができます。また、タッチアンドトライコーナーにて、実際にマシンを操作してお好きなメニューをご試飲いただくことができます。リヴェリアならではの幅広いカフェメニューを手軽に味わうコーヒーの新習慣をぜひご体感ください。 ※ムセッティは、1934年にイタリア ピアチェンツァで創業した老舗ロースター。20カ国以上のコーヒー豆を吟味し、イタリアの伝統的製法を重んじた焙煎システムで、厳選されたブレンドを提供している。 ■本イベント限定アイテム！デロンギ オリジナル トートバッグをプレゼント*！ 会場でアンケートにご回答いただくと、コーヒーの麻袋をイメージしたデロンギオリジナルトートバッグをプレゼントします。この二日間だけの限定アイテムです。 *数量に限りがございます ■人気のデロンギ全自動コーヒーマシンが一堂に！ 全自動コーヒーマシンの中から、リヴェリアをはじめとする人気機種を会場内に展示致します。人気の全自動コーヒーマシンを実際に見て、比べて、じっくりお選びいただける絶好のチャンスです。気になる製品は会場でお得に購入することも可能です。 イベントおよびプレゼントの内容はやむを得ない事情により予告なく変更することがございます。あらかじめご了承ください。 ■イベント開催概要 ●名称：「デロンギ リヴェリア 全自動コーヒーマシン新製品 発売記念イベント 挽くたびに、特別。コーヒーの 新習慣を愉しむ二日間。」 ●日時：2025年4月26日（土）・27日(日) 11時～19時 ●場所：六本木ヒルズ ヒルサイド 2F ヒルズカフェ/スペース ●住所：東京都港区六本木6丁目10-1 ●参加費用：無料 ●参加方法：当日参加 【 製品情報 】 製品名： デロンギ リヴェリア 全自動コーヒーマシン 型式番号：EXAM44055G EXAM44055BG EXAM44035B 本体色：ペブルグレー(EXAM44055G) サンドベージュ(EXAM44055BG) オニキスブラック(EXAM44035B) 希望小売価格：オープン ペブルグレー：商品サイトはこちら サンドベージュ：商品サイトはこちら オニキスブラック：商品サイトはこちら デロンギ リヴェリア 全自動コーヒーマシンは、ビックカメラ、ヨドバシカメラ、デロンギ直営店（表参道店）とデロンギ公式オンラインショップ、デロンギ公式楽天市場店、デロンギ公式Yahoo! ショッピング店とAmazonでお求めいただけます。 デロンギ ― 進化し続けるブランド ― デロンギ（De’Longhi）は、20世紀前半より、イタリア北部の街トレヴィーゾでクラフトマンワークショップ（職人の作業場）としてスタートしたイタリアの家電ブランドです。1974年に、最初の電気機器であるオイルヒーターを製造し、工房から工場へと飛躍的に発展を遂げました。1990年代には、暖房器具の製造で使われる技術を用いて、コーヒーマシンの開発・製造にも参入。コーヒー市場に積極的に新しい製品を投入し続け、現在、全自動コーヒーマシンをはじめとするコーヒーマシン市場において世界的トップシェアを誇ります。 ブランドスローガン「Better Everyday」について 「Better Everyday」は、 2011年から続くデロンギのブランドスローガンです。消費者のニーズや時代に合わせて製品は少しずつ変化しながらも、根底にあるこの想いは変わらず守り続けています。 「Better Everyday」は、デロンギがお客様へ提供したい「家で過ごす時間をより愉しく、心地よいひとときに変える」というブランド・コンセプトを体現しています。人々の日常に寄り添うというコンセプトと、より豊かな時間をもたらすという想いがこめられており、製品設計の際にもこの考えを大切にしています。デロンギ製品を使うお客様が、毎日、より心地よく、より充実した、より愉しめる暮らしへ。まさに、「より良い毎日へ」というコンセプトです。 ■デロンギ・ジャパンについて デロンギ・グループの日本法人の「デロンギ・ジャパン株式会社」は1995年に設立。主な事業は、日本市場向け家庭用・業務用電気製品の輸入販売となり、以下分野の商品・付帯サービスを取り扱っています。 1. オイルヒーター、マルチダイナミックヒーター、パネルヒーター、ファンヒーター等の暖房機器および空気清浄機付きファン。 2. 全自動コーヒーマシン、エスプレッソ・カプチーノメーカー、ドリップコーヒーメーカー等のコーヒー機器。 3. ハンドブレンダー、フードプロセッサー、コンベクションオーブン、電気ケトル等の小型調理家電製品。 主力商品であるオイルヒーターは、2004年以来20年間、日本市場において販売台数・売上No.1※１の地位にあり、多くのお客様から支持され続けています。コーヒー機器分野でも、日本だけでなく世界各国でコーヒーメーカー売上No.１※2を獲得しており、優れた機能だけでなく、洗練された美しいデザイン性を備えたデロンギ製品は、世界の国と地域で愛されています。 ※1 独立調査機関調べ 2004年1月～2023年12月 日本国内数量・金額シェア ※2 独立調査機関調べ 2023年1月～12月 このプレスリリースには、 メディア関係者向けの情報があります メディアユーザーログイン 既に登録済みの方はこちら メディアユーザー新規登録 無料 メディアユーザー登録を行うと、企業担当者の連絡先や、 イベント・記者会見の情報など様々な特記情報を閲覧できます。 ※内容はプレスリリースにより異なります。 すべての画像 種類 商品サービス ビジネスカテゴリ 調理・生活家電 キーワード デロンギ リヴェリア 全自動コーヒーマシン 新製品体験・試飲イベント 六本木ヒルズカフェ ダウンロード プレスリリース添付資料 . pdf プレスリリース素材 このプレスリリース内で使われている画像ファイルがダウンロードできます 会社概要 デロンギ・ジャパン株式会社 33 フォロワー フォロー RSS URL https://www.delonghi.com/ja-jp 業種 製造業 本社所在地 東京都港区南青山3-1-34 3rd MINAMIAOYAMA 9階 電話番号 - 代表者名 甲斐ラース 上場 海外市場 資本金 - 設立 1995年03月 トレンド情報をイチ早くお届け PR TIMESを友達に追加 PR TIMESのご利用について 資料をダウンロード

mentions.title: 34 Products Millennials Would Probably Tell Gen Z To Get For Their First Place
mentions.content: Millennial-Approved First Home Products For Gen Z BuzzFeed Shopping logo BuzzFeed Shopping logo Search Gift Guide Beauty + Personal Care Fashion Home Sports + Fitness Stores Tech Kids Pets Sex Toys View All We hope you love our recommendations! Some may have been sent as samples, but all were independently selected by our editors. Just FYI, BuzzFeed and its publishing partners may collect a share of sales and/or other compensation from the links on this page. Posted on Apr 14, 2025 Subscribe to Shopping Newsletter Caret Down 34 Products Millennials Would Probably Tell Gen Z To Get For Their First Place Here's to herb keepers, sink plungers, standing weeders, and all the other products that make living life a little easier. by Mallory Mower BuzzFeed Staff Facebook Pinterest Link 1. A silicone clip-on strainer that's dishwasher-safe, attaches to any size pot or pan, and is designed to save a bunch of space in your kitchen when post-college life hits you hard and you realize your paycheck is *not* getting you an apartment with...an actual kitchen. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "This is easy to use and now that I’ve had it a few weeks, I don’t know how I have lived without. Makes draining anything in water so much easier! Highly recommend." — Melissa L. Get it from Amazon for $9.48+ (available in 17 colors). 2. A pair of outlet lights so you can give your landlord's special apartment an effortless glow-up. You could even say this space-saving solution is, ahem, lit . Amazon Promising review: "I don't like night lights because they take up the wall outlet, so this was the perfect solution. I put it in the guest bath and at night with the bathroom door open this provides just enough light to guide a person to the bathroom without blinding them . I ended up putting two on my hallway switches as well. What a great product." — LMK Get it from Amazon for $22.98 (available in three sizes and colors). 3. A pumice cleaning stone for saving your toilet bowl from a bleak existence now that you're old enough to, well, legally drink. Over 18,000 reviewers have given this a 5-star rating for getting rid of their harsh hard water stains from rust, lime, and calcium — sans any harsh chemicals. www.amazon.com Promising review: "I have very hard water that leaves hard-water buildup and nasty stains. It’s embarrassing to have guests over because the toilets are so gross! I have tried so many products and cleaning solutions — from natural essential oils to harsh chemicals so strong I was lightheaded for the rest of the day. Well, I tried out this pumice stone after reading about it in a BuzzFeed article, and honestly the hype is real! It does take some elbow grease, but the after picture is from only 20 minutes of scrubbing, light enough that I didn’t break a sweat! The stone does get used up, but I think this one should last me a couple of years at least. So if you have embarrassing toilets, try this! " — Stephanie Ray Get it from Amazon for $9.26 (available in multiple pack sizes). 4. A set of reusable microfiber mop pads so you don't have to worry about running out of disposable pads right when you need them most. Save some time and money with these extra-thick microfiber versions! Oh, you haven't thought about any type of mop pad even once in your life? Welcome! Let us show you around. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com They can be used wet or dry and on basically every type of flooring and even drywall if you're so inclined. Since they can be thrown in the wash, one microfiber pad can replace up to 100 single-use pads. Promising review : "Just used these for the first time with my Swiffer WetJet , and I gotta say I am impressed! Went on easily and cleaned the floors easily! I always hated the one-time-use pads and never felt like they got my floor clean. This review is NOT sponsored, I bought these with my own money because I’m sick of single-use products. Seriously, buy these now!!! " — AKGross Get a set of two from Amazon for $10.95 . 5. A bottle of Angry Orange Pet Odor Eliminator , a fan-favorite among pet parents, this odor-eliminating spray is gonna lift stains from carpet and furniture while *also* pulling out the odor that is often left behind. Don't lose your rental deposit because of Lucky's lack of house training; learn from our mistake. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Angry Orange is a small biz that was founded in 2014. They provide pet-related household cleaning supplies like stain removers, mops, and more. Promising review: "This product is amazing!!!! We have a Rottweiler pup and a Bichon pup, and our house was feeling the PAIN! I tried everything and used to tell my wife, 'With all the science and technology in the world, we still can’t come up with something that gets rid of the dog mark smell!' This product does everything and more. Just ordered another round. We were about to throw away some furniture due to the smell, and now, after use, we can keep it. Saved me hundreds. Well worth the money. " — clayton s tonkin Get it from Amazon for $17.96+ (available in two sizes and in multipacks). 6. A versatile veggie chopper that'll help you prep (and clean up!) with speed that feels downright magical. The interchangeable blades just pop out, then just throw them right into the dishwasher. It's time to say "goodbye" to fast food and start making your own food...fast. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "Makes life so much easier. I can't imagine chopping onions or bell peppers by hand anymore, and it does so much more. This requires very little effort to cut through the food and it has a generous container." — Amazon Customer Get it from Amazon for $22.99+ (available in four styles and three colors). 7. A ChomChom pet hair remover roller to pick up fur and lock it inside the roller so that cleanup is a breeze and it doesn't lose its effectiveness with heavy use. We love our pets but woof, shedding is their greatest skill. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "I have a golden retriever and the shedding is out of control. My fabric sofa is constantly covered in hair and I finally decided to try this after reading an article about popular TikTok products. The reviews do not lie, this thing works magic!! I wish I had taken a before and after picture because the difference is noticeable. I watched the video tutorial before I tried it to ensure I was using it properly and everything he says is true, you do really have to put your arm to work with vigorous back-and-forth movement! However, I find it's a great arm workout and it works wonders." — Joanne Ertel Get it from Amazon for $23.99+ (available in three colors). 8. An herb keeper that'll prevent your refrigerator from becoming a graveyard for well-intentioned grocery purchases. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "This product is designed to be perfect for its usage. Herbs stay fresh and visible. Plus, it is beautiful looking. So much better than using a drinking glass." — zerg4 Get it from our Goodful line on Amazon for $19.99 . 9. A stuffed waffle maker — this applause-worthy appliance is designed with a deep, bowl-like griddle which allows you to cook the batter with fillings (we're talking chocolate, fruit, cheese, meat...the works). Upgrade your morning routine from frozen waffles to a homemade meal that'll look straight off a "best of" brunch menu. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "I bought this after I saw a video on TikTok, so I had an idea about the yummy waffles I could make. First waffles were stuffed with apple pie filling. Second ones scrambled eggs with bacon and cheese . Just amazing!!! The only way you could make this better is to send a chef!! I definitely recommend watching a video on TikTok or YouTube to inspire you before you start!!" — Adirondackdarling Get it from Amazon for $49.99 . 10. A bottle of Better Life all-natural tile and tub cleaner that'll banish soap scum, mold, mildew, rust, and hard-water stains from the tired, worn-down tiles in your "new" place. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review : "I have an old shower/bathtub. I tried name-brand shower cleaners and bleach to try and clean the soap scum off the tiles and tub. I had no luck and I would cough and get sick because of how strong the smell was. I thought I would try this to save my lungs. I sprayed my entire shower and left it for about 15 minutes. I came back and rinsed off the walls and they were shiny! I've never had such a clean shower. The smell is amazing and subtle. All I smell is tea tree and it didn't affect me at all. The price is also a good deal since the bottle is pretty large. It came with the sprayer separate and the bottle sealed so it wouldn't leak in the box. I highly recommend this." — Amber Erwin Get a two-pack from Amazon for $15.99 . 11. A hidden fly trap you just plug into an outlet when you have flies, fruit flies, moths, or gnats crawling around. The little light lures bugs by up to 400 feet (!!!) and the sneaky design means this thing'll be blastin' bugs by the dozen without ruining your room's clean aesthetic. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Check out a TikTok of the plug-in fly trap in action. Promising review: "I can’t say enough wonderful things about these handy little bug catchers! They are simple to use, cheap to refill, and catch a ton of small bugs and flies. I have eight of them now, all around my house! It’s a little gross how many tiny flying insects are around…but it makes me feel a lot better now that I have these!" — Chris H. Get a pack of two from Amazon for $12.99 (available in multiple pack sizes). 12. Luigi's Sink and Drain Plunger for those of us who treat the drain in our sink like a black hole, assuming the dyed hair, toothpaste, and skincare that gets in there will just disappear for good. It won't... so grab this and save the pipes from yourself! www.amazon.com Please note how hard I'm trying not to make a Super Mario Bros. plumbing joke right now. Promising review: "Y’all, this thing is amazing! My kitchen sink was completely clogged for four days. I’ve been trying to clear the drain with a different sink plunger that I already had and it didn’t do diddly squat. I was about to give up and call a plumber. Then I decided to order this one and it just arrived… it completely cleared the drain in like three minutes. So then I decided to take it to the bathroom sink that had been draining extremely slow and within a minute, I had the water running so quick and smooth again. I got the small one and it’s the perfect size for kitchen and bathroom sinks." — JNeen Get it from Amazon for $14.99+ (available in four styles). 13. A rice cooker can take the guesswork out of making the perfect bowl of rice. It might be the most used appliance in your kitchen, because you can basically feed yourself for every single meal with this thing. Amazon, www.amazon.com Promising review: "I love this product. I've made so many different rices in it. The only thing I suggest is when making rice that might end up sitting in the pot for a while, put some olive oil on the bottom as the rice tends to stick if it's sitting on the 'warm' setting for too long, or add some extra water. The rice cooker is wonderful though. It's a real time-saver. " — Michelle Get it from Amazon for $16.74+ (available in four sizes). 14. A power drill scrubber brush set for power cleaning any questionable stains the last renters left behind. These brushes clean tile, glass, and even upholstery. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "So I kept seeing this item on TikTok and thought, 'heck, why not?' I love this item for deep cleaning, whether it's car mats, shoes, or the shower." — A. Givens Get it from Amazon for $18.95 (available in six styles). 15. A fume-free oven cleaner that'll easily eat up baked-in stains, so you can keep your place from burning down while you make home cooking a habit. www.amazon.com Promising review: "I'm a little embarrassed to write this review; it's been six years since my last oven cleaning. After seeing the results, I couldn't help but spread the word. Sure, it took some beer, a little John Mayer, and a lot of elbow grease, but I got the job done, thanks to this handy little product. It did require two treatments; however, given the circumstances, this product accomplished quite a feat in just an hour." — William Get it from Amazon for $8.98 . 16. A foaming garbage disposal cleaner to clean buildup out of your rental's sink before your landlord decides to dispose of your deposit. Amazon Promising review: "Saw on TikTok (don’t judge) and automatically added to cart. So easy to use, takes probably a minute to fully bubble up and clean, and you’re left with a clean sink! I use with other drain cleaning products, but would 100% recommend for weekly maintenance." — Jessica Hamilton Get a four-pack from Amazon for $3.22 . 17. An odor-neutralizing candle that'll rid your place of the smells your fur child leaves behind, rather than just covering them up with some frilly florals. www.amazon.com , Mallory Mower / BuzzFeed I'm in a small apartment with multiple litter boxes and two particularly well-fed cats. These candles were recommended to me by a coworker when I brought up the stress of keeping my place smelling fresh. I get each new scent every season, because they are the only thing I need to keep my home from smelling like pets. I firmly believe they are the best odor control around. Promising review: "This successfully eliminates pet and other odors. It's in a beautiful container. It's easy to maintain. I will always have one in my home. This product is the miracle pet owners have been waiting for. " — Daniel Get it from Amazon for $23.99 (available in multiple scents and packs). 18. A window fly trap to get rid of pesky house flies in an efficient and sanitary way now that spring is bringing back the bugs. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "Gross yet effective. We live in the country with animals so we have lots of flies. I did not want to hang a fly trap but caved when I saw this. I feel it’s not as noticeable as others and is easy to hide and works very well. Easy to hang and does not leave a sticky residue when removed." — Tina Get a pack of 12 pieces from Amazon for $7.99 . 19. A Tubshroom that'll keep your drain clog-free fur ever. www.amazon.com Promising review: "Can't say enough good things about this product. I have a family of four and would frequently have to snake our shower drain, it appears I won't be having that problem ever again. I even give my dog baths and this collects the hair. It does not seem to slow down the flow of water down the drain significantly. I'm very impressed having been using around a month. You don't know how much hair you wash down your drain until you use this!" — Aaron Morlock Get it from Amazon for $12.95+ (available in six colors). 20. An extendable microfiber duster set , because your high ceilings makes your new apartment a great place to live , but a rather difficult place for your short self to dust . Amazon This includes an adjustable handle that extends from 24 to 49 inches, a regular short handle, a fluffy duster, and a bendable chenille and microfiber duster. Promising review: "Perfect for my needs. Love the telescoping design and that it has no protruding joints that would prevent it from fitting underneath furniture with low clearance. Reaches under, behind and around all the tight spaces I can't get to without moving heavy furniture around. The duster is also very lightweight and can handle delicate situations." — Sjay Get it from Amazon for $18.95+ (available in two set sizes). 21. A jar of The Pink Stuff (the internet's favorite cleaning product) that'll clean everything from pots and pans to blotches in your bathtub. Move over firefighters, I want a calendar of THIS sexy stuff and its shiny results. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "I used this product for my stove because it's one thing I dislike cleaning. I have used multiple degreaser sprays and they all are so toxic and don't work for me. The Magic Eraser was okay but I used several at a time and I had to scrub so hard . But this product oh my goodness, legit a miracle. It doesn't have any type of smell . I put the paste on a cloth, clean the area then wipe it off with a damp cloth and voilà, magic!" — May Get it from Amazon for $5.97 . 22. A microwave cleaner — it's gonna save your microwave from your messiest leftovers. Bring it on, spaghetti. www.amazon.com Promising review: "This is something I didn't believe until I tried it. All it took was a quick swipe with a paper towel and GONE. It loosened everything, and it was sooo white once cleaned!! I would buy these as gifts." — JDesmond Get it from Amazon for $8.89+ (available in four colors). 23. A set of vacuum storage bags so you can stow away your entire winter closet when the sun shines down on us again, instead of shoving it all into a garbage bag on your closet floor. So long, sweater weather! www.amazon.com Promising review : "THESE ARE LIFE-CHANGING. They even give you a hand pump to use in case you're taking the bags camping or just don't have a vacuum handy. I tested the pump to see how well it works, and it worked perfectly! Works just as well as a vacuum, just takes a little more effort pumping out the air. Using these bags, I got half my closet back! I used three bags to store ALL THE items in my closet including three large pillows and several thick blankets and comforters. I will most definitely be buying more; these are fantastic!!!" — Knastay Get a six-pack from Amazon for $19.99+ (available in five size options and three quantities). 24. A quilted chenille floor pillow that'll help if you're in an apartment so small, "furniture" is a word that needs a little wiggle room...because your place has none at all. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "This comes just as pictured and described. It is comfortable and looks luxurious. It's great for floor seating." — AKhan Get it from Amazon for $33.99 (available in eight colors). 25. A microfiber dusting glove , because microfiber is the very best material to use when picking up pesky dust particles, and you're gonna see why when you use this! Whoever thought to turn a cleaning cloth into a glove is a true genius. Amazon, www.amazon.com Promising review: "Do you hate having to dust around things? I know I do. This glove is ideal — you can just wipe away dust while easily maneuvering around odds and ends in your way. Because it’s your own hand inside the glove it’s also easy to maneuver over oddly shaped things like silk plants or blinds. I absolutely recommend this!" — Clever_Collectors Get it from Amazon for $14.89 (available in two styles). 26. A standing weeder with three steel claws that grip weeds and roots so you can pull them out while standing. There's no need to bend down all day while pulling out weeds in your new yard! www.amazon.com This is made with a bamboo handle and powder-coated steel. The simple lever system is what makes pulling weeds with this so easy! Promising review: "Oh my god, I friggin' love this tool. I bought this on a whim given we bought our first house and know nothing about caring for a yard. Boy has it come in handy. Our new house had a ton of weeds in the front yard and this tool helped me get most of them out in no time. In fact, the process of yanking out the weeds was strangely satisfying! I don't think anyone can say that weeding is fun but this tool made it as close to fun as you can get , especially when you see a long root along with the weed you pulled." — JG Get it from Amazon for $39.97 . 27. A 10-piece mixing bowl set to use as mixing bowls, serving dishes, leftover containers, and the family popcorn bowls. I own these and have told my whole family to get them. You Gen Zers were next on my list! Get them. Amazon, Mallory Mower / BuzzFeed I bought these bowls after a coworker found them (oh yeah, I'm totally a sucker for BuzzFeed shopping posts) and I can't help but rave about them! They all nest easily, which makes storing simple in my tiny Brooklyn kitchen, and the lids are a major bonus for storing leftovers. They're also practically indestructible – my cat has knocked these off the counter as a set and individually (he's a monster) and they've held up great! Get it from Amazon for $37.99 (available in two styles). 28. A Scrubbing Bubbles toilet cleaning stamp that'll be easy peasy to put on *and* makes cleaning your toilet simpler than it's ever been! Mostly because, with this, you won't be the one cleaning your toilet. Scrubbing Bubbles / https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ie8Pubca84E, Scrubbing Bubbles Promising review: "I was sooo skeptical and was confused about how they’d work but the gel solidifies and with every flush, suds wash through with the water and it really makes a fresh difference . Also the scent is light but really nice and fresh! I recommend these 100%! They’re super interesting but they do the job." — Janet Get six stamps from Amazon for $4.67 . 29. An ultra-thin socket cover with an attached six-plug power strip you can use if you'd prefer your furniture actually be directly against the wall, thank you very much. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "This product is awesome! We bought one in the office to stop a nearby chair from continuously hitting the outlet plugs. It solved the problem right away. So we ordered three more to use anywhere there is bulk on the wall. It saves space, makes arranging furniture and desks easy, it's clean looking. Someone is a genius. Thanks so much!" — Jay Get it from Amazon for $22.95+ (available in four styles and two sizes). 30. A door draft stopper that'll be a great choice if the gap under your door is doing its best to suck out all of your AC into the hot, humid hallway this summer. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com This is also great for noise reduction and preventing some critters and creepy crawlies from making their way in. Promising review: " I had a problem with birds and snakes getting in under the screened in porch door. This easily solved the problem. It has held up so far." — Cheryl Ford Get it from Amazon for $9.99 (available in four colors). 31. A can of fire extinguishing spray with a design to spark your muscle memory, because nothing sounds scarier than not knowing how to use an extinguisher when you notice a fire start to spark! www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "I bought one for beside the grill, one for beside the stove, one for the laundry room, and one for the car. I think the intuitive, easy to use design is fantastic. We already have the muscle memory for using a spray can. In an emergency, it's so much easier to grab this and use it, and turn a small fire into a non-fire. I don't have time to remember a three step method of fire control when my bacon has gotten out of control on the stove. I'm not a firefighter! I'd really like to have one in every room. Think about it. Isn't it better to immediately contain a small fire than deal with a big one? This could save your life, and your house. " — K. Zander Get it from Amazon for $11.99 . 32. A handy Souper Cubes freezer tray that'll make it ~souper~ easy to store notoriously hard-to-freeze things like soups and sauces. Being able to defrost individual portions of soup has my all-too-adult heart all aflutter. Amazon, www.amazon.com This is BPA-free and dishwasher safe! Souper Cubes is a small, family-owned business that was founded in 2017. They also appeared on Shark Tank ! Promising review: "LOVE, LOVE, LOVE. My freezer is so much more organized now. Gone are the days of having to defrost an entire bag of chicken broth for one cup for a recipe. I now have perfectly portioned 1/2-cup and 1-cup blocks ready to go. They fit easily in freezer bags, take up less space, and make me incredibly happy. There was a lot of attention to detail put into the design and I particularly appreciate the wire inside the rim that holds everything steady — no more worrying about spilling all the liquid on the way to the freezer. Just a fantastic product all around. I purchased this and a cheaper version from another manufacturer at the same time but returned the other product. This one is definitely worth the added cost." — Kate Get it from Amazon for $19.95 (available in three colors). 33. A fast-acting lawn repair formula for when your dog's peeing, playing, and digging inevitably wreaks havoc on your yard. This easy-to-use combination of grass seeds, mulch, and soil amendment is specifically designed to repair pet-induced damage and get new grass growing ASAP. www.amazon.com Promising review : "I used this in the spring to fill out our lawn more, and it worked great! I was worried because I feel like you always hear grass seed horror stories, but I just raked our lawn good, spread seeds all over, and watered it once (sometimes twice) per day and it filled the lawn in beautifully! " — Mariah Get it from Amazon for $16.44 . 34. A collapsible cooling rack so you can have the proper setup when your cookie cravings are greater than your counter space. www.amazon.com , www.amazon.com Promising review: "This is easy to set up, sturdy, and saves counter space! I'm so happy with this purchase." — Sun Family Get it from Amazon for $33.99+ (available in two colors). Reviews in this post have been edited for length and clarity.
